snippet: The Supreme Court blocked a federal appeals court ruling that was forcing abortion clinics in Texas to close, allowing them to remain open during appeals.
abstract: Supreme Court allows more than a dozen Texas abortion clinics to reopen, blocking state law that had imposed strict requirements on abortion providers; order represents interim step in legal fight that is far from over.

byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez contributed reporting from Dallas, and Erik Eckholm from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court blocked a federal appeals court ruling that was forcing abortion clinics in Texas to close, allowing them to remain open during appeals.

headline.main: Supreme Court Allows Texas Abortion Clinics to Stay Open
headline.print_headline: Clinics to Open as Justices Halt Abortion Law
